stanza.line: Th expense of spirit in a waste of shameshame
Is lust in action and till action lustlust
Is perjured murdrous bloody full of blameblame
Savage extreme rude cruel not to trusttrust
Enjoyed no sooner but despised straightstraight
Past reason hunted and no sooner hadhad
Past reason hated as a swallowed baitbait
On purpose laid to make the taker madmad
Mad in pursuit and in possession soso
Had having and in quest to have extremeextreme
A bliss in proof and proved a very woewoe
Before a joy proposed behind a dreamdream
All this the world well knows yet none knows wellwell
To shun the heaven that leads men to this hellhell
